item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: You can also walk around AFK by turning it on while on a wind rider, then using the right click to move to different spots (at least you were able to a few weeks ago - dunno if they've tried hotfixing that one yet).
item.content:encoded: You can also walk around AFK by turning it on while on a wind rider, then using the right click to move to different spots (at least you were able to a few weeks ago – dunno if they’ve tried hotfixing that one yet).

item.title: By: Akari
item.dc:creator: Akari
item.description:
It's an option you can turn on. I believe it's in the interface options.
-Akari
item.content:encoded:
It’s an option you can turn on. I believe it’s in the interface options.

-Akari

item.title: By: Abalieno
item.dc:creator: Abalieno
item.description:
Now you have to tell me how you can chat while AFK. Because I tried but as I send a message the flag goes away.
Cheater! :D
item.content:encoded:
